definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Liangshang Formation mudstone is the direct cap rock of the Carboniferous gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 石炭系氣藏的直接蓋層是下二疊統梁山組泥岩層。

sentences.english: The predicting effects are very good to Carboniferous strata in southwest Tarim basin.
sentences.chinese: 在塔里木盆地西南地區石炭系地層中，預測效果良好。

sentences.english: Carboniferous gas reservoirs are widely distributed in the east port of Sichuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 川石炭系氣藏廣泛布川盆，已氣藏。

sentences.english: There are three formation modes of Carboniferous gas pools in east Sichuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 川東地區石炭系氣藏屬於箱外成藏。

sentences.english: Main stratums of exploration are Permian and Carboniferous.
sentences.chinese: 勘探層位以石炭系和二疊系爲主。

sentences.english: Carboniferous siliciclastic rocks in Tazhong area, Tarim Basin are good reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 塔中地區石炭系碎屑岩是優質儲層。

sentences.english: The Qilixia Structural belt is one of Carboniferous high-angle structural belts in East Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 七裏峽構造帶是川東石炭系高陡構造帶之一。

sentences.english: The main Carboniferous reservoir rocks in Kaijiang area are granular and rubble dolomites.
sentences.chinese: 開江地區石炭系儲集巖類主要爲顆粒雲巖和角礫雲巖。

sentences.english: The assemblage of generating, reservoiring and capping conditions of the Carboniferous in South China is favorable.
sentences.chinese: 南方石炭系油氣生儲蓋條件的配置關係相當好。

sentences.english: The dissolution convection may be an important mechanism for the migration and accumulation of gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 水溶對流可能是石炭系天然氣運聚成藏的重要機制。

definition: Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
Silurian system (geology)/see 志留紀|志留纪
lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)
